verses.verse: The Lord <WH3068> is my light <WH216> and my salvation <WH3468>; whom shall I fear <WH3372>? the Lord <WH3068> is the strength <WH4581> of my life <WH2416>; of whom shall I be afraid <WH6342>?
When the wicked <WH7489>, even my enemies <WH6862> and my foes <WH341>, came <WH7126> upon me to eat up <WH398> my flesh <WH1320>, they stumbled <WH3782> and fell <WH5307>.
Though a army <WH4264> should encamp <WH2583> against me <WH3820>, my heart shall not fear <WH3372>: though war <WH4421> should rise <WH6965> against me <WH982>, in this will I be confident.

One <WH259> thing have I desired <WH7592> of the Lord <WH3068>, that will I seek <WH1245> after <WH3427>; that I may live in the house <WH1004> of the Lord <WH3068> all the days <WH3117> of my life <WH2416>, to behold <WH2372> the beauty <WH5278> of the Lord <WH3068>, and to inquire <WH1239> in his temple <WH1964>.

For in the time <WH3117> of trouble <WH7451> he shall hide <WH6845> me in his pavilion <WH5520>: in the secret <WH5643> of his tabernacle <WH168> shall he hide <WH5641> me <WH7311>; he shall set me up upon a rock <WH6697>.

And now shall my head <WH7218> be lifted up <WH7311> above my enemies <WH341> round about <WH5439> me <WH2076>: therefore will I offer in his tabernacle <WH168> sacrifices <WH2077> of joy <WH8643>; I will sing <WH7891>, Yes <WH2167>, I will sing praises unto the Lord <WH3068>.
Hear <WH8085>, O Lord <WH3068>, when I cry <WH7121> with my voice <WH6963>: have mercy <WH2603> also upon me <WH6030>, and answer me.
When you said <WH1245>, Seek you my face <WH6440>; my heart <WH3820> said <WH559> unto you <WH6440>, Your face, Lord <WH3068>, will I seek <WH1245>.

Hide <WH5641> not your face <WH6440> far from me <WH5186>; put not your servant <WH5650> away <WH5186> in anger <WH639>: you have been my help <WH5833>; leave <WH5203> me not <WH5800>, neither forsake me <WH430>, O God of my salvation <WH3468>.
When my father <WH1> and my mother <WH517> forsake <WH5800> me <WH3068>, then the Lord will take me up <WH622>.
Teach <WH3384> me your way <WH1870>, O Lord <WH3068>, and lead <WH5148> me in a plain <WH4334> path <WH734>, because of my enemies <WH8324>.
Deliver <WH5414> me not over unto the will <WH5315> of my enemies <WH6862>: for false <WH8267> witnesses <WH5707> are risen up <WH6965> against me <WH3307>, and such as breathe out cruelty <WH2555>.
I had fainted <WH3884>, unless I had believed <WH539> to see <WH7200> the goodness <WH2898> of the Lord <WH3068> in the land <WH776> of the living <WH2416>.
Wait <WH6960> on the Lord <WH3068>: be of good courage <WH2388>, and he shall strengthen <WH553> your heart <WH3820>: wait <WH6960>, I say <WH3068>, on the Lord.
